Class ProjectsViewFiltersView

java.lang.Object
com.group6.views.applicant.ProjectsViewFiltersView
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticatedView, View
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantViewMyApplicationsFilterView
public class ProjectsViewFiltersView extends Object implements AuthenticatedView
View for the applicant to filter the projects view.
